void* kl_microrcpy ( void *KL_RESTRICT  dest,
const void *KL_RESTRICT  src,
size_t  size 
)

Small-block memory copy.

This is a memcpy function which is intended for use in small size copies. The implementation behind this function should cause minimal cache pollution and not do any kind of large-batch optimization.

Parameters:
dest Destination address.
src Source address.
size The size of memory to be copied.
Returns:
The destination address.
